title: West Calder United F.C.
text:
West Calder United Football Club are a Scottish <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="West%20Calder">West Calder</a>, <a href="West%20Lothian">West Lothian</a>. Their home ground is Hermand Park, West Calder. Club colours are red and black.
The <a href="Scottish%20Junior%20Football%20Association">SJFA</a> restructured prior to the 2006–07 season, and West Calder found themselves in the 15-team <a href="Scottish%20Junior%20Football%20East%20Region%20South%20Division">East Region, South Division</a>. They finished 12th in their first season in the division. 
Currently they play in the <a href="East%20of%20Scotland%20Football%20League">East of Scotland Football League</a> and the team is managed by Crawford Bell and Dale White.
